title: SB Xero OCR Global Reader
description: Reads a single Xero attachment PDF, runs OCR, and returns structured data.

fileName.title: File name
fileName.description: Name of the PDF file, e.g. 2016-000123_Milseain_Invoice.pdf

fileContentBase64.title: File content base64
fileContentBase64.description: Base64-encoded contents of the PDF file.

invoiceId.title: Invoice ID
invoiceId.description: Xero invoice ID (or empty if not known).

lineItemId.title: Line item ID
lineItemId.description: Xero line item ID (or empty if not known).

attachmentId.title: Attachment ID
attachmentId.description: Xero attachment ID for this PDF.

masterAttachmentKey.title: Master attachment key
masterAttachmentKey.description: Master attachment key used to link back to the Attach Master CSV.

likelyTrackingHorse.title: Likely tracking horse
likelyTrackingHorse.description: Optional: horse the invoice is most likely associated with (free text, may be blank).

xeroYear.title: Xero year
xeroYear.description: Financial year this invoice belongs to (e.g. 2016).

targetType.title: Target type
targetType.description: Processing target for this file, e.g. 'invoice', 'credit-note', 'orphan', etc.
